node.html: Learned how to optimize websites for mobile-first indexing and improve visibility in mobile search results by applying mobile-focused SEO techniques.
Learned the fundamentals and strategies for performing effective keyword research to improve search engine optimization results.
Learn advanced strategies to identify Linkreators, find proven topics, choose the right keywords, and create SEO-optimized Power Pages.
The course covered on-page signals, technical SEO, and SEO for mobile—helping solidify a foundational understanding of modern SEO practices.
Learned how to optimize websites to boost visibility in local search results and map packs, helping local businesses attract customers geographically.
Learned core use cases like content creation, campaigns, and AI prompting to streamline marketing efforts and boost creativity.
Gained practical knowledge on initiating projects, writing business cases, modeling diagrams, and handling stakeholder requirements.
Gained skills to grow an online business, get hired as a digital marketing expert, and work remotely as a freelancer.
Gained actionable strategies for traffic generation and real-world ranking improvements.

frontmatter.title: Project Intern – Renault Nissan Mitsubishi Alliance
frontmatter.company: Renault Nissan Automotive India Private Limited

node.html: Gained practical exposure to the workings of the automobile industry and developed core skills necessary for a professional engineering environment.
Gained real-world exposure to CRM practices, complaint handling, and customer interaction strategies that align with modern marketing
This event helped develop strong technical fundamentals and teamwork skills while deepening my understanding of clean energy technologies and automotive innovation.
